definition: ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: The national leaders have approved the strategy of "promote economy cooperation around Beibu Gulf".
sentences.chinese: 廣西北部灣經濟區在泛北經濟合作中具有戰略地位。

sentences.english: Beibu Wan Basin was a lake in the middle Eocence-Lower Oligocene.
sentences.chinese: 北部灣盆地在中始新世至早漸新世是一個湖泊。

sentences.english: First on my list is the infamous Gulf of Tonkin incident.
sentences.chinese: 首先在我的清單中的是臭名昭著的北部灣事件。

sentences.english: But it faces opportunity of development on the other hand due to the Pan-Beibu-Gulf cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 但由於泛北部灣合作的緣故它的發展還是面臨機遇的。

sentences.english: Pan-Beibu Bay economic area has developed rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 泛北部灣經濟區發展迅速。

sentences.english: To the West of Hainan is the Gulf of Tonkin .
sentences.chinese: 海南省的西部是北部灣。

definition: Dongxing county level city in Fangchenggang 防城港[Fang2 cheng2 gang3], Guangxi
Binhai New District, subprovincial district of Tianjin
Fangcheng district of Fangchenggang city 防城港市[Fang2 cheng2 gang3 shi4], Guangxi
Bashi Channel in the northern part of the Luzon Strait, just south of Taiwan

Binhai (place name)/Binhai New District, subprovincial district of Tianjin/Binhai county in Yancheng 鹽城|盐城[Yan2 cheng2], Jiangsu/fictitious city Binhai in political satire/Primorsky, a territory in the far east of Russia
